overview:
Ash King is a digital media and digital marketing specialist.

He co-founded CreativeAspect with Brian Shin (CEO, Visible Measures) which was acquired by MedSite (now a part of WebMD). He worked directly under Jeremy Allaire (CEO, Brightcove) to develop and market the Spectra CMS and became evangelist and master instructor for the product. He served as Director of Technology for Family Point and oversaw the acquisition by iVillage. He also co-founded ProjectNapa along with Terence Pua (CEO, InSynq) and Brian Shin and served as Chief Technology Officer.

He first brought streaming video commerce to the web in 1994 and was featured by HBO and several leading publications. He co-authored several best selling technology books with Ben Forta (Adobe) and others. As a consultant with Twin Technologies he has implemented digital media solutions for 19 Entertainment, AEG Digital Media, Brightcove, Adobe, TV Guide and many other media and enterprise companies.
